title: Conduct an Off-the-Record Briefing
description: A source is willing to provide background information to help a reporter understand a complex topic, but does not want to be quoted. The reporter must conduct an 'off-the-record' briefing.

tasks.description: Before the meeting, clearly establish the ground rules with the source, confirming the conversation is 'off the record'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Both parties agree on the terms of the conversation.

tasks.description: During the meeting, take detailed notes for personal understanding, but do not record the conversation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent captures the information for background context without creating a record that could identify the source.

tasks.description: Use the information learned to find other, on-the-record sources or public documents that can confirm the information.
tasks.expected_outcome: The off-the-record information is used as a roadmap for further, verifiable reporting.
